thread.title: Watch The Stranger Things Kids Rap In The Golden Globes’ Opening Musical Number
thread.title_full: Watch The Stranger Things Kids Rap In The Golden Globes’ Opening Musical Number

author: Peter Helman
title: Watch The Stranger Things Kids Rap In The Golden Globes’ Opening Musical Number
text:
8:31 pm   
The Golden Globes are going down at the Bevery Hilton Hotel tonight. Host Jimmy Fallon opened things up with an elaborate, star-studded musical parody of frontrunner La La Land featuring Justin Timberlake, Tina Fey, Amy Adams, Nicole Kidman, Ryan Reynolds, and the award show mainstays that are the kids from Stranger Things , who proved that Eleven isn’t the only one of the gang who can rap . Watch below. #GoldenGlobes : Watch the Stranger Things kids, Justin Timberlake and more in @JimmyFallon 's opening https://t.co/3LXEaXfc4q pic.twitter.com/QH1Y4EZzPB
